Mission.Name: Once a Hero
Mission.Intro: With all four fragments of the mystic Amulet recovered and restored, the Yamabushi monks of the mountain village have set their plans in motion. If the war against the great Dragon King, Sho-Riu, is to have any chance of victory, the forces of light will need powerful champions to lead the charge. Though many brave new Heroes have risen to the challenge in these dark days, legend tells of one such Hero that would be a great ally to the cause. Killed in battle, the spirit of this fallen Hero still lingers in the shadow between worlds - the Forest of the Dead! With the power of the Amulet, it may be possible to bring them back to the world of the living.

Rule.Name: All Gates Lead to the Forest of the Dead

Mission.Name: Cursed Temple
Mission.Intro: Strolling through the local market, a strange old man watching you catches your eye. Following him down a back alley; he vanishes. As you turn to leave, he is there behind you, waiting! "You and your companions have been chosen. Only you can cleanse a great evil that infests this land." Handing you a set of Yamabushi charms, he tells you of a cursed temple near here that must be cleansed of evil...before it spreads.

Mission.Name: Sacred Relic
Mission.Intro: Visiting the small Shrine at the outskirts of the village for a blessing on your travels, a nervous Brotherhood monk approaches you with a small scrap of rice paper. Passing it to you as he walks through the arched gate of the garden, the monk disappears into the trees. Unfolding the note, it explains that there is a mystical relic discovered by a sect of the Brotherhood a century ago and safeguarded for generations in one of their secret mountain temples. Unfortunately, that temple has been overrun and the Brotherhood fears that the hiding place for the Relic will soon be discovered! It needs a new protector to recover the relic and keep its power safe from the shadows.

Mission.Name: Enemy at the Gates
Mission.Intro: Barring the massive front gates of the temple, you climb the castle wall to look out over the fields below. A sweeping army of Takobake soldiers, led by the Fallen Shogun himself has surrounded the temple! As you search desperately for another way out, the thundering sound of battering rams and splintering wood echoes through the halls.

Rule.Name: Hard to Hold Back the Darkness

Mission.Name: Beast Beneath the World
Mission.Intro: Fleeing through the tunnels beneath the temple, you begin to realize that the walls of this passageway have a strange texture... and are drippings with goo! Something's not right here. But there's no time to stop, you can hear the armies of the Fallen Shogun busting through the barricades behind! Pushing into the dark, you emerge into a living chamber, with sizzling acid pooled in depressed areas of the floor. You seem to have found your way into a living creature that resides deep underground, below the fortress. Who knows how long this beast has slumbered beneath the world. Stepping further into the room, the floor rumbles and the sound of the soldiers that were chasing you is replaced with the gurgle and roar of rushing liquid! In the distant shadows behind, you can make out a roiling tidal wave of caustic acidic bile hurdling toward you. It's time to find a way out of here... any way out, and fast!

Rule.Name: Hero Party Marker in the Middle Stage

Mission.Name: Ancient Hunger
Mission.Intro: The Beast beneath the world has stirred from its age-old slumber! Bursting up out of the Earth beneath the Temple, it is now on a rampage to feed it's ancient hunger. Still trapped inside the creature, you must find the Heart of the Beast to try and kill it before it consumes half the villages in the countryside, and beyond!

Mission.Name: Power of the Shogun
Mission.Intro: Learning of a secret passage that leads deep into the heart of the Fallen Shogun's fortress, you know that this is your one best shot at defeating the master of the Takobake Clan for good! It may be a suicide mission if you are caught, but it is the only way to get close enough to end the Shogun's terrible rule once and for all. When the sun sets, you move out under the cover of night. With any luck, the Fallen Shogun will never see you coming.

Mission.Name: Shadow War
Mission.Intro: A local Daimyo has come to you in secret because he fears that one of the Ninja Shadow Clans is plotting the downfall of his house! "You must help me, or my Clan will only be the first to fall to their treachery!"

Mission.Name: Master of Death
Mission.Intro: Following rumors and clues you have discovered the location of one of the Shadow Clans' hidden Ninja Castles. This is the time to Strike! If you act quickly, you may be able to catch the villains and their leader offguard But this is no ordinary castle. It is said the Ninja Castles of the Shadow Clans are filled with hidden passages and deadly traps to kill any that would dare enter uninvited!

Objective.Name: Finding the Shadow Clan War Room

Mission.Name: A Tangled Web
Mission.Intro: A Spider Queen hos consumed one of the local Samurai Clans and is spreading evil magik from within its tainted halls. You must find her lair and burn it!

Rule.Name: Hard to Hold Back the Darkness

Mission.Name: Shadow of the Dragon
Mission.Intro: An Elemental Dragon has been terrorizing all of the local villages in the region, swooping down from the skies to smash buildings and crush townsfolk with its sweeping body! Its lair must be close Trucking the beast to a nearby castle, if you sneak in undetected, you may have a chance to put on end to the tyranny!

Mission.Name: Fury and Flame
Mission.Intro: This is it! The Dragon King's army has amassed on the field of battle and is sweeping across the land consuming all in its wake! Many Ninja died to bring you word that Sho-Riu...the Dragon King himself, is commanding his forces from the ruins of d once great Samurai fortress at the base of the Sacred Mountain. You have one chance to stop this tyrant before all the world is covered in darkness, Perhaps a small band of daring Heroes can do what an entire army of soldiers could not. By sneaking post the rampaging hordes and getting close enough to fight your way through the Dragon's personal guards, you may be able to defeat him before his power is too great to overcome!

Mission.Name: Plague Wind
Mission.Intro: A Deadly mist covers the land, necrotizing flesh and withering the trees. If the source of this plaque wind isn't found and stopped soon, death will spread across the land, consuming all within its corrupting reach!

Mission.Name: The Burning Beast
Mission.Intro: A fierce Onmorake Carrion Phoenix has been burning the local villages with its deadly fire every night, raising the scorched villagers back as Scourge Dead. The terrified villagers have come to you seeking your help. "If you do not stop this burning beast, the deathly files will consume us all! You must help us! Find its burial mound and destroy it! Or the flames of decay will continue to spread!"

Mission.Name: Holding Court
Mission.Intro: Lightning flashes across the sky and a supernatural storm begins to churn in the heavens as a group of sinister Takobake sorcerers performs a dark ritual to harness the power of the Void!

Mission.Name: Stolen Soul
Mission.Intro: As you sit in the local tavern, you begin to realize that one of the other Heroes is not acting like themselves - rude, crude, and generally terrible. Soon word spreads that a powerful summoner in the castle on the hill has been stealing souls from the living to fuel his dark magik!

Mission.Name: Showdown - Undead Daimyo
Mission.Intro: All of the villages in the area have been ransacked and raided by the armies of a legendary villain. Now the Surviving townspeople have gathered together a large reward to pay any Heroes brave enough to hunt down and stop the fiend from continuing his reign of terror. The last several groups of Heroes that embarked on this mission have not been heard from, since, but good news...the reward is still unclaimed!

Mission.Name: Showdown - Tengu Blind Master
Mission.Intro: All of the villages in the area have been ransacked and raided by the armies of a legendary villain. Now the Surviving townspeople have gathered together a large reward to pay any Heroes brave enough to hunt down and stop the fiend from continuing his reign of terror. The last several groups of Heroes that embarked on this mission have not been heard from, since, but good news...the reward is still unclaimed!

Mission.Name: Riders of the Storm
Mission.Intro: Thunder roars in the distance and brilliant lightning flashes across the sky as a heavy rain pelts the roof of the tavern. Getting up to order another drink, you are approached at the bar by a cloaked figure. "It is your choice," he says in a hushed tone. "What's that old man?" You lean in closer, straining to hear. "It is your choice...to live under the Dragon's rule, or to give your lives to the fight against tyranny." Enthralled by the strangers tone, he tells you a tale of a lost relic; one of the few ancient items left that could help to defeat the great Dragon King, Sho-Riu. As your group intently listens to the old Yamabushi Master, lightning crashes again, and the walls of the tavern shake from the rolling thunder. "They're getting closer, the Raijin. They too know that the relic is near. They also search for it, to protect their Dragon masters. You must find it first!"

Mission.Name: Deadly Harvest
Mission.Intro: Lost in a maze of steam-filled chambers, you quickly realize that you are not alone!

Rule.Name: Hard to Hold Back the Darkness

Mission.Name: Village Raid
Mission.Intro: A band of armed thugs has been raiding all of the villages throughout the countryside, threatening the people and taking what they want, before smashing up the place. Today they've come to this village... but they didn't count on you being here.

Mission.Name: Burn It To The Ground
Mission.Intro: Awakened in the night by screaming and crashing, you rush from your beds into the streets. Bright orange flames at the night sky and the panicked townspeople run in all directions. Armed thugs with torches run from the shadows, hurling their burning brands into the thatched roofed buildings. If these bandits are not stopped; this village will be a smoking ruin withing the hour!

Mission.Name: Assassination Plot
Mission.Intro: The local Samurai Warlord has heard rumors that a group of assassins are coming to attack the village, and to take his head. They may even already be here. He is not sure if it is on the orders of a rival Warlord, or something more sinister, but he has gained many enemies over the years. Fearing for his life, he has ordered his most loyal bodyguards to stand watch over his house through the night, and he has requested your aid in patrolling the village and flushing out any hired killers. If you can help keep the Warlord alive until morning, you will be paid handsomely for your efforts.

Rule.Name: Hard to Hold Back the Darkness

Objective.Name: If the Samurai Warlord is Killed

Mission.Name: The Dark Well
Mission.Intro: An old well sits in the far side of town, boarded up and overgrown. You've heard stories from neighboring villages of the dark secrets buried by the townsfolk here, and the hushed whispers of a dreaded evil that promised to come back for revenge. But those are just campfire stories told to frighten children… right?

Mission.Name: Cillage Overrun
Mission.Intro: The village is under attack from all sides! Creatures and Demons are pouring in, sweeping through the streets and carrying townspeople off into the night! Someone needs to stand against this darkness, or this village will be lost!

Mission.Name: Honor Duel
Mission.Intro: The sun is high in the sky and there's a stillness in the air. Challenged to a duel in the street by one of the locals; you face off amongst a crowd of jeering onlookers. As swords are drawn, a hush falls over the village. Blood will be spilled.
